attributes.action: Considerably strengthen plans to make it a criminal offence to possess violent pornography or any images, in any media, which advocate, or risk causing, violent, and/or sexual, assaults on children or women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been cases in the media in which women especially, and sometimes children, have been assaulted as a result of their attackers viewing such images.  The "freedom" to view these should be FAR outweighed by the right of women and children not to suffer such attacks and, above all, the effect on the victim(s) of these should be taken into acccount.  Porn is the theory; RAPE is the practice!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Considerably strengthen plans to make it a criminal offence to possess violent pornography or any images, in any media, which advocate, or risk causing, violent, and/or sexual, assaults on children or women."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11956.asp
